ovdesc.p: This is mapping table to do the connector details for the outward real-time service calls / transaction calls to publish the data to the external system.

desc.p: This field is used to define the connection methodology to publish the extracted message.
This field has the options of JMS / MQ / CUSTOM / WEBSERVICE.
Validation Rules
TAFC
In-case if the option is JMS user needs to attach the DELIVERY MDB handler name in CONNECTION.HANDLER.
In-case if the option is MQ user needs to attach the PostMessage MDB handler name in CONNECTION.HANDLER.
In-case if the option is CUSTOM user needs to attach there own handler name to trigger the MDB.
In-Case if the option is WEBSERVICE they need to attach the XDFE handler name to publish the webservice call.
This is an optional routine, if the user needs to update the array details before sending the data to publish.
A valid T24 Routine needs to be attached in this field to derive the ID for upload a data or to extract the data.
Validation Routine
The routine has a validation against EB.API
Example the routine should be prefixed with @ID @T24.ROUTINE.NAME
This field should hold the MDB handler name to trigger the CALLJEE.
In-case if the environment is TAFJ and the CONNECTION.METHOD marked as CUSTOM this field should updated with a valid EB.API record and that should hold the source type as JAVA.
This field should defines with webser .
This field is specifically used only for position based INWARD / OUTWARD FILE processing and extraction.
Validation Rules
Valid values websphere / jboss / weblogic.
This field used to key in the user name if the server needs any authentication.
This field used to key in the password if the server needs any authentication.
This field is used to key in the webserver JEE host name / IP address where the MDB was deployed.
This is a associate multi-value field with the below field so the user can configure multiple host to lookup.
This field is used to key in the webserver JEE port where the MDB was deployed.
This is a associated multi-value field with above field so the user can configure multiple ports to lookup.
This field should hold the IP address for the IBM MQserver if the connection is for posting the message in MQ.
In case if its TAFJ for posting the message to JMS,MQ system IP needs to be configured in this field.
This field should hold the port number for the IBM MQserver if the connection is for posting the message in MQ.
In case if its TAFJ for posting the message to JMS,MQ system running port needs to be configured in this field.
This field should hold the MQ manager name running in IBM MQserver if the connection is for posting the message in MQ.
Validation Rules
This field will become mandatory if the connection method keyed as MQ.
This field should hold the MQ Channel name running in IBM MQserver if the connection is for posting the message in MQ.
Validation Rules
This field will become mandatory if the connection method keyed as MQ.
This field holds the connection bus if the web server field configured as WEBSPHERE.
The field used to define the time out for the synchronous call.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
